product_name: Royal Robbins Cool Mesh Stripe Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Breathable, soft and wrinkle-resistant, the women's Royal Robbins Cool Mesh Stripe Shirt is a must-pack for your summer vacations near and far. Open-weave fabric blends cotton and organic cotton and is naturally soft, breathable and comfortable. Squared neckline and front button placket. Discreet zippered pocket at hip secures small items. Royal Robbins Cool Mesh Stripe Shirt features cap sleeves, a straight hem and front vent slits. Closeout.
short_description: Breathable, soft and wrinkle-resistant, the women's Royal Robbins Cool Mesh Stripe Shirt is a must-pack for your summer vacations near and far.
